content.raw:
done here 187c354, reverted keyboardPose operations. This pull request now does two things:

  - add HaptixControlPlugin::SetWorldPose to support  hxs_set_model_transform sim api.
  - reset HaptixControlPlugin::keyboardPose when user clicks reset buttons on the gui.
content.html:
done here 187c354, reverted keyboardPose operations. This pull request now does two things:

  • add HaptixControlPlugin::SetWorldPose to support hxs_set_model_transform sim api.
  • reset HaptixControlPlugin::keyboardPose when user clicks reset buttons on the gui.

content.raw: after some thought, @hsu and I decided we should revert the change in `SetKeyboardPose` that was cause the buggy behavior observed by @scpeters and address this fix in a later pull request. the important part of this PR is the the new callback `SetWorldPose`, which is published to in the sim API.
content.html: after some thought, @hsu and I decided we should revert the change in SetKeyboardPose that was cause the buggy behavior observed by @scpeters and address this fix in a later pull request. the important part of this PR is the the new callback SetWorldPose, which is published to in the sim API.
